p: Healthy Wistar rats of both sexes, with an average weight of 185 g were obtained from the Animal House, Department of Biological Sciences, Usmanu Danfodiyo University (UDU), Sokoto, Nigeria and were used in the present study. The animals were housed in cages in the Department of Veterinary Pharmacology and Toxicology Laboratory, UDU, Sokoto, Nigeria for a period of two weeks to acclimatize prior to commencement of the study. They were fed on pelletized growers feed (Vital feedÂ®) and tap water provided ad libitum. All the experiments were approved by the Departmental Animal Ethics Committee of the Usmanu Danfodiyo University, Sokoto in line with the OECD 2001 standard guidelines on laboratory use of animals.
